title: Jerome Alexander MagicMinerals AirGlow Tinted Highlighting Night Mist, Illuminating Airbrush Tinted Moisturizer Spray, Natural Pearl
features: ILLUMINATING TINTED MOISTURIZER & HIGHLIGHTER: A lightweight, luminous tinted moisturizer that helps cover imperfections and give you a natural, radiant glow.

LIGHTWEIGHT COVERAGE: MagicMinerals AirGlow tinted moisturizer provides weightless coverage that effortlessly blends on your skin so you can build the coverage you need with a lasting, luminous finish.
FLAWLESS, SHIMMERING GLOW: AirGlow has a shimmery finish that gives you a perfect sheer, dewy glow for an evening out.

EASY APPLICATION: Fast and easy to use, leaving you with flawless, radiant skin in less than five minutes. Simply shake and spray the AirGlow tinted moisturizer to a kabuki brush and apply to fresh skin. Buff onto face, cheeks, and neck to blend.
CHOOSE FROM 4 SHADES: Natural Pearl, Petal Pearl, Champagne & Bronze Glow
description: RETHINK FOUNDATION! Jerome Alexander MAGICMINERALS AIRGLOW TINTED MOISTURIZER & HIGHLIGHTING MIST A lightweight, luminous tinted moisturizer for natural radiance. MagicMinerals AirGlow Tinted Moisturizer Airbrush Spray enhances your skin & gives you a sheer, dewy glow for the perfect evening look. This lightweight tinted moisturizer shimmers like pearls to bring out your skin's natural radiance.
